name.japanese: 人間オークション会場

description: A notorious establishment on Sabaody Archipelago where human beings and other species are auctioned off as slaves. The auction house is managed by Disco and secretly owned by Donquixote Doflamingo. It features a large auditorium for buyers and a backstage area where enslaved people are held in cages.

keyEvents.title: Human Auctioning House Introduced
keyEvents.description: The auction house is revealed as the location where Camie is being held, serving as the central location for the upcoming confrontation.

keyEvents.title: Celestial Dragons Arrive
keyEvents.description: Saint Rosward and Saint Shalria arrive at the auction house to purchase slaves, demonstrating the World Nobles' participation in this system.

keyEvents.title: Rayleigh Revealed in Holding Area
keyEvents.description: The backstage holding area is shown where Silvers Rayleigh is among the enslaved people awaiting auction.

geography.terrain: Multi-level building with auditorium seating and backstage holding cells

population.visitors: Wealthy buyers including Celestial Dragons, pirates, and nobles

culture.government: Privately owned by Doflamingo, managed by Disco

statusHistory.description: Operating as a slave auction house

trivia: The Human Auctioning House is connected to Donquixote Doflamingo's criminal empire
Despite the World Government declaring fish-men as equals 200 years ago, the auction house continues to operate legally on Sabaody Archipelago
The auction house becomes the site of one of the most pivotal moments in pre-timeskip One Piece

name.japanese: シャボンディ諸島 GR1

description: Grove 1 is the area of Sabaody Archipelago where the Human Auctioning House is located. It is known as one of the unlawful zones of the archipelago where illegal activities like slave trading are permitted to operate.

keyEvents.title: Arrival at Grove 1
keyEvents.description: The episode shifts focus to Grove 1 where the Human Auctioning House operates.

culture.government: Part of Sabaody Archipelago's grove system

trivia: Grove 1 is part of the lawless zones (Groves 1-29) of Sabaody Archipelago
The grove system is based on the numbering of the giant mangrove trees that make up the archipelago

name.japanese: シャボンディ諸島 GR30

description: Grove 30 is a shopping district area of Sabaody Archipelago featuring various shops and a shopping mall. This is where Robin explains the history of fish-men discrimination to Nami.

keyEvents.title: Robin's Historical Explanation
keyEvents.description: In Grove 30's shopping mall, Robin explains to Nami the dark history of discrimination against fish-men and merfolk.

geography.terrain: Shopping district built on mangrove tree

trivia: Grove 30 is part of the shopping and coating district (Groves 30-39)
This is where the Straw Hats were shopping before Camie was kidnapped
